title: Spacious master bedroom with private shower&Bathro
description:
Hey, I’m Paul. I own a house in Northeast Philadelphia- furnished(if you’d like, but can be removed if you so choose to)Currently i have 3 bedrooms, with 2.5baths available, along with washer/dryer/dishwasher. The house is a shared house currently with one tenant. All utilities are included. First and last month’s rent will be collected by move-in date. If you’re unfamiliar with the area, Northeast Philadelphia is a very safe, quiet and nice section of Philadelphia. As far as getting around everything goes by way of either Roosevelt Blvd or I-95; 2and half miles away. Pennypack Park entrance is a half a block away and full of 10+miles of paved trails for horseback riding, walking, or biking; unpaved paths for more of a hiker. Also Pennypack Creek is stocked every April and perfect for fishing.
-Washer/dryer
-Dishwasher
-Two blocks from public transportation.
-Quiet, Nice older neighbors
-Well kept properties
Thanks for reading. Let me know if it interests you! -Paul

description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 2106 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 21st floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. title: A Tremendous Opportunity to Live at the Cusp of Two Top Neighborhoods
description:
Rittenhouse Square and Graduate Hospital. 1702 Lombard Street offers 4 finished levels of living space and is move-in ready. Step up from the sidewalk and enter into an open front living room featuring hardwood floors, a brick fire place, recessed lighting, and crown moulding. The open first level continues into the kitchen, which showcases granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a subway tile backsplash. Just beyond the kitchen are Pella sliding doors that lead out to an oversized red brick patio, the perfect retreat for the city dweller! Back inside, follow the stairwell up to the second floor. This level contains two bedrooms, closet space, and a white tiled bathroom. Steps above, the third floor houses the primary suite which includes a vaulted ceiling, two closets, a wonderfully updated primary bath with marble flooring and pedestal sink, and a bonus linen closet. Before heading on your way, step down to the lower level, which is fully finished and provides a convenient flex space. An additional room off of the main basement area can fashion as a bedroom, if desired. A laundry room with washer and dryer, as well as additional closet space complete the lower level. The perks of living at this address are countless! Locals enjoy the Schuylkill Banks park and dog park, top restaurants in Rittenhouse Square, charming cafes in Graduate Hospital, a handful of grocers, and quick access to I-76 and I-676. This location also offers convenient access to the University of Pennsylvania, CHOP, and HUP. Schedule your visit today!
1702 Lombard St

title: RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BED, 1 BATH CORNER UNIT, WITH 2-CAR PARKING!
description:
Tucked away in Philly's vibrant Queen Village neighborhood, 830 S Howard St #2 is a recently renovated 2 bed, 1 bath corner unit, with 2-car parking, sat on the top level of a duplex. An idyllic courtyard, with gardens and picnic seating, welcomes you at the front of the building. Inside the unit, soaring cathedral ceilings and new luxury flooring frame the bright and airy living room. This space is filled with natural light from 3 windows and a skylight, while a 4th window brightens the separate dining area. The kitchen is fitted with new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and plenty of cabinet & counter space. There's also room for extra storage or a small table. Down the hall, you'll find a sleek full bathroom adorned with modern fixtures, a glass-enclosed shower, and an updated vanity. Completing the unit are two spacious bedrooms. The primary bedroom has a wet-bar and a pair of sliding doors leading to a Trex deck spanning the unit's width. The building's shared laundry area is on the ground floor, along with an entry from this unit's one garage parking spot and one driveway spot. 830 S Howard's fantastic Queen Village location earns a Walk Score of 93! Nearby South St features markets, restaurants, and cafes, including Whole Foods, ACME, Good Karma, and Bridget Foy's. South of Washington Ave, neighborhood favorites Herman's Coffee, Charlie's Roast Pork, and Pennsport Beer Boutique line E Moyamensing Ave. Shot Tower playground & rec center and Jefferson Sq Park are a few blocks away, plus Target, Acme, Wine & Spirits, Ikea, and Lowes are close by. There's also easy access to public transit, Old City, I-95, and South Jersey via I-76. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!
830 S Howard Street Ct #2

description:
Welcome to the Dorchester #1602! This spacious studio is in one of the most popular condominiums in the city and is situated right in the heart of Philadelphia. This unit features parquet wood flooring (currently covered by carpeting), a practical floor plan and an updated kitchen with a clean look featuring wood cabinets and white and stainless steel appliances. The Dorchester is a 24 hour door person building with a rooftop pool, fitness center, and underground parking available to the residents (all for additional fees.). title: Spacious 3 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath Home Situated in the Exciting Northern Li
description:
Welcome to 941 N Randolph Street! This is a spacious 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home situated in the exciting Northern Liberties section of Philadelphia and is now available for rent. On the entry level you will find a large living room, formal dining room, and an updated/modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, a large island, and a wine fridge. The rear of this main level provides a mud room and a convenient, updated, and chic powder room. Moving up one level you will find two spacious bedrooms and a full bath with tub/shower combo. Top-level offers a loft-style bedroom that can be used as a bedroom, an office, bonus room or a workout room. You are sure to enjoy the fenced rear yard which offers privacy and plenty of room for a table and chairs. The basement provides the laundry area as well as additional living and storage space. The property is located on a quiet and serene street that does not see much traffic. Within walking distance you can access Liberty Lands Park & Community Garden, gastro pubs like Standard Tap, and the Piazza - An open air plaza surrounded by unique artisans shops, bottle shops, a record store and boutiques. This area has an exceptional walk score and easy access to public transportation. Your new home is just a few clicks away, inquire now and be settled into this cozy home soon in time to enjoy the holiday season! (Furry friends -- pets will be considered on a case by case basis).
941 N Randolph St

description:

The spacious living area features a cozy electric fireplace and flows seamlessly into the upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a door leading out to the large, private rear yard.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets.
